content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (status: EntityStatus.WORKING) with coal count: 0 and iron ore count: 4.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has enough fuel (coal) before inserting iron ore to maintain continuous operation.

### Errors when extracting items from the furnace
- Make sure to check the iron plate count in the furnace before extracting to avoid unnecessary extraction attempts when the count is low.
